All policy terms and conditions are stor: Ol politik termis and kondishons ar stored on di blokchain, ensuring komplet transparenzi and immutabiliti.
Blockchain-based insurance uses smart co: Blokchain-beist inshurens yuses smart kontrakts tu automate polisi manejment and kleims prosesing. Yu pe premiums in kriptokurrensi or tradishonal kurrensi, and di polisi terms ar stored on di blokchain. Wen a kuvred event okurs (verifaid bai data sorsis laik IoT divaisis, weda data, or ofishal ripots), di smart kontrakt automatikali prosesis yor kleim and ishus peiment widaut manual intervension.
Blockchain-based life policies with auto: Blokchain-beist laif polisis wit automatik eksekushon and kriptokurrensi deth benefits.
Can I pay premiums in cryptocurrency?: Kan Ai pe premiums in kriptokurrensi?
Choose the coverage that fits your needs: Chus di kuvrej dat fits yor nids wit fleksibol peiment opshons.
Coverage for event cancellations or disr: Kuvrej fo event kanselashions or disrupshons wit automatik rifunds.
Coverage for funds invested in decentral: Kuvrej fo funds invested in disentralaizd fainans protokolz agenst haks or eksploits.
Crop and livestock insurance with automa: Krop and laivstok inshurens wit automatik kleims beist on weda data.
Decentralized medical records and usage-: Disentralaizd medikal rekords and yusej-beist premiums wit DeFi helth seivings.
Esports tournament coverage and in-game: Esports turnament kuvrej and in-geim aset inshurens.
Explore our innovative blockchain-powere: Eksplor aur inovetiv blokchain-pauered inshurens kategoris
Find answers to common questions about o: Faind answas tu komon kweschons abaut aur blokchain-beist inshurens servisiz.
Flight delay compensation and lost lugga: Flait dilei kompensashon and lost luggej kuvrej wit automatik kleims prosesing.
From crypto to cars, health to homes - p: From kripto tu kaas, helth tu homs - protekt wat maters wit aur inovetiv blokchain inshurens solushons.
Have questions about our insurance solut: Hav kweschons abaut aur inshurens solushons? Aur tim iz hia tu help.
How do I file a claim?: Hau du Ai fail a kleim?
Many claims are processed automatically: Meni kleims ar prosesd automatikali thru aur smart kontrakt sistem wen verifaid data konfirms a kuvred event. Fo kleims dat rekwaia adishonal verifikashon, simpli log intu yor akaunt dashbord, navigate tu di kleims sekshon, and folo di gaided proses. Yu'll nid tu provaid diteils abaut di insident and eni rekwaierd dokyumenteishon. Aur tim rivyus manual kleims promptli, tipikali within 24-48 auas.
Name: Niem
Our blockchain-powered insurance process: Aur blokchain-pauered inshurens proses iz simpl, transparent, and efishent
Our insurance solutions leverage blockch: Aur inshurens solushons leverage blokchain teknoloji fo transparenzi, efishensi, and sekuriti.
Pay premiums and receive claims in crypt: Pe premiums and risiv kleims in kriptokurrensi or steibolkoins wit loa fiis and fasta prosesing.
Premiums are calculated based on several: Premiums ar kalkyuleted beist on several faktors inkluding di valyu ov asets biing inshured, di spesifik riskis biing kuvred, historikal data, and rial-taim risk asesment. Fo sertin inshurens taipis laik ka or helth inshurens, wi kan yus data from konekted divaisis tu ofa yusej-beist praising dat riwaards seif biheivia wit loa premiums. Wi ofa personalaizd kwots afta a brif risk asesment.
Protect your Non-Fungible Tokens against: Protekt yor Non-Funjibol Tokens agenst theft, damej, or maakit volatilati.
Protect your digital investments against: Protekt yor dijital investements agenst haks, theft, and smart kontrakt feilyurs.
Select from our range of insurance categ: Selekt from aur reinj ov inshurens kategoris and kustomaiz yor kuvrej tu fit yor nids.
Smart contracts automatically process an: Smart kontrakts automatikali proses and pei aut kleims wen verifaid kondishons ar met, elimineting dileis.
Smart contracts for employee benefits an: Smart kontrakts fo emploi benefits and suplai chein inshurens wit automatik kleims.
Smart home integration with IoT sensors: Smart hom integrashon wit IoT sensos fo automatik damej detekshon and kleims.
Smart telematics-based claims and pay-pe: Smart telematiks-beist kleims and pe-per-mail opshons wit automatik peiauts.
We offer comprehensive coverage across m: Wi ofa komprihensiv kuvrej akros multipl kategoris inkluding kripto asets, vihikols, homs, helth, travel, biznis asets, intelektual properti, NFTs, pets, and mor. Ich inshurens taip haz spesifik kuvrej opshons teilord tu di yunik riskis ov dat aset klas. Kontakt us fo a komplet list ov kuvred asets in yor aria ov interest.
What types of assets do you cover?: Wat taipis ov asets du yu kuva?
When a covered event occurs, verified by: Wen a kuvred event okurs, verifaid bai rial-world data, yor kleim iz automatikali prosesd and peid.
Yes, we accept premium payments in major: Yes, wi aksept premium peiments in meja kriptokurrensis inkluding Bitcoin, Ethereum, and steibolkoins laik USDC and DAI. Wi also ofa tradishonal peiment metodz fo dos hu prefer dem. Kriptokurrensi peiments often rezult in loa fiis and fasta prosesing taims fo both premiums and kleims.
Your policy is created as a smart contra: Yor polisi iz kreated az a smart kontrakt on di blokchain, ensuring transparenzi and immutabiliti.
